technicalAssessment.feedback: Candidate displayed a severe lack of technical understanding in React and system design, admitting to reliance on AI for code generation without comprehension and attempting to use external aids.
strengths: No clear strengths identified. Candidate's knowledge was superficial and heavily reliant on AI.
weaknesses: Lacks understanding of React fundamentals (state management, hooks)
Unable to describe complex components or data flow accurately
Superficial knowledge of system design principles (rate limiting)
Relies on AI for code generation without personal comprehension
Attempted to use external aids (phone) during technical questions

comments: Admits to generating all code from AI without personal understanding.
Unable to explain basic code snippets or hooks used in their own described project.

projectDiscussion.feedback: Project discussion was marked by unprofessionalism and a singular, crudely expressed focus on monetary gain, with a complete dismissal of ethical considerations for an AI platform.
projectDiscussion.technicalDepth: Minimal to non-existent. Discussion focused on inappropriate monetary motivations rather than technical aspects, value, or user problems solved by the AI platform.

behavioralAssessment.feedback: Behavior was grossly unprofessional, featuring inappropriate language, dismissiveness towards interview protocols and ethical questions, and multiple instances of academic dishonesty.

malpracticeFlags.note: A second person briefly walks into the background.
Candidate looks down and interacts with phone, stating intent to show a snippet.
Candidate explicitly admits, 'I pumped out every code from AI,' laughing.
A second person clearly enters frame, stands beside candidate, appears to look at screen and attempt to pass something.
Candidate turns head and speaks inaudibly to off-screen person after interviewer notes third party.
The first person (from background at start) re-enters room and remains visible, sometimes looking towards candidate/screen.

finalRecommendation: Candidate must fundamentally address severe deficiencies in professionalism, ethical conduct, and core technical skills before re-consideration for any technical role.
